item.title: webGL for Koch snowflake
item.description: Problem Description Draw the Koch snowflake using recursive method! calculate the point for the Koch lines function calculatePoint(center, p){ var angleInDegrees = 60; var angleInRadians = angleInDegrees * Math.PI / 180; var s1 = Math.sin(angleInRadians); var c1 = Math.cos(angleInRadians); var x1 = (p[0] - center[0]) * c1 - (p[1] - center[1])* s1 + center[0]; var y1 = (p[0] - center[0]) * s1 + (p[1] - center[1])* c1 + center[1]; var f = vec2(x1,y1); return f; } divide line into koch line and call the function recursively function divideLine(a, b,count) { if(count === 0){ var left; var right; left = mix(a,b,1/3); right = mix(a,b,2/3); var f = calculatePoint(left,right); drawLine(a,left,f,right,b); } else { var ab = mix (a,b,0.
